shoppingcart.csrLockErrorMessage: The cart is currently locked by another customer service representative. {{errorUserName}} will not be able to make changes until it is unlocked.
shoppingcart.customerLockErrorMessage: Your cart is currently lockedby a customer service representative. You can make changes to the cart after it is unlocked.
shoppingcart.takeLockOverMessage: This order is locked by another administrator {{realLockOwner}}. If you want to work with this order or unlock it, click Take Over
